abstract: Citigroup plans to drop two senior board members, clearing the way for its incoming chairman, former Time Warner Chief Executive Richard Parsons, to clean house, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup plans to drop two senior board members, clearing the way for its incoming chairman, former Time Warner Chief Executive Richard Parsons, to clean house, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Citi to Shed Veteran Board Members, Report Says
